tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    encrypted_credit_card_info VARCHAR(200),
    access_level VARCHAR(20) CHECK (access_level IN ('admin', 'user')), 
    last_login TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    credit_card_number VARCHAR(16) ENCRYPTED,
    encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT order_customer_fk FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    encrypted_address VARCHAR(150),
    encrypted_credit_card VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    phone_num VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sensitive_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    data_description VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY(customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

CREATE TABLE access_control (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE backups (
    backup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backup_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    backup_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    address TEXT,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE accounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    account_balance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    account_type VARCHAR(20),
    open_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT REFERENCES accounts(account_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE backups (
    backup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backup_date DATE,
    backup_type VARCHAR(20),
    file_path TEXT
)
